item.description:
Janene D is organizing this event...Thank you Janene!

 8 courts

Please join us for tennis under the bubble, appetizers and dinner.
White apparel preferred.

6:30 pm. Warm Up
7:00 -8:00 pm. Round Robin
8:00-8:30 pm. Appetizers
8:30-9:30 pm. Round Robin
9:30 pm. Dinner

To Reserve Your Space. You will need to provide your credit card details.

48 hour cancellation policy for refund.

Please call Weston Racquet Club (WRC): Between Sunday, October 14th and Thursday, October 19th 7 a.m. –11 p.m.
Tel: 781-890-4285

Please register early to ensure a space as this is also open to WRC members and non-Sitz members. Payment to Weston Racquet Club (WRC) secures your spot.

If you have any questions please email: davis_janene@yahoo.com

$30.00 includes tennis, dinner, appetizers, etc. Bar drinks are available, but are not included.

Note: If you are a member at Weston Racquet Club $20.00
No tennis, Dinner Only: $16. 00.

Payment is to be made directly to Weston Racquet Club. Paypal is not available for this event.

Directions:
From Mass Turnpike/I-90
Take 95/128 NORTH, and exit Winter Street 27B. At the end of the exit ramp, turn right at the light. Bear right at the top of the hill, over the highway. At the bottom of the ramp, merge right, and go through the stop light. Turn left onto West Street at the second stop light. WRC is about 1/4 mile down the street on the left.
From the North (I-93, Route 2, Route 3)
Take 95/128 SOUTH, and exit Winter Street 27B. Bear right off the exit ramp, and go through the stop light. Turn left ontoWest Street at the second stop light. WRC is about 1/4 mile down the street on the left.
item.name: Tennis anyone? Under the "Bubble" (Indoors)
